case.name: Removing leotard
case.description: Cammy tries to take off her leotard, but accidentally rips the bottom part.

case.name: Removing holsters
case.description: After taking off her hat, Cammy removes her holsters, believing they don't count as clothing.

case.name: Removing the rest of the leotard
case.description: Cammy removes the rest of her leotard, turning around and exposing her butt.

case.name: Removing boots
case.description: Cammy removes her boots, sitting down in a suggestive way.

case.name: Wedgie
case.description: When playing with Chun-Li, Cammy will ask her to help her remove her leotard. Chun-Li will then accidentally give her a wedgie and rip the bottom of her leotard.

case.name: Sneaky Juri
case.description: When playing with Juri, she'll sneak behind Cammy when she has to remove the last part of leotard, ripping it off.

case.name: Chun-Li's apology
case.description: Chun-Li apologizes to Cammy after destroying her clothes.

case.name: Cammy's retaliation
case.description: After Juri undresses Cammy, she'll return the favor by punching her.
